idea: 21Grams Food Creations Pvt Ltd is a start-up in the food industry having an objective of marketing and distribution of packaged food products. As the first line of product under the brand name - Curry Tree the company will be selling gravy paste that is pre-mix of masalas for indian curry dish. Gravy paste is segmented in the ready to cook segment of the food industry. 21Grams will explore Indian market as well as take curry tree brand to overseas. Currently Curry Tree products are available on www.growcurrytree.com,  Amazon, Goqii store, Flipkart and a few retail stores in Bombay.
name: 21GRAMS FOOD CREATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We want to promote the work of Indian Artisans by bringing them to a consolidated platform of ours.
